title: Vantar öryggi í gamlan land rover?

posts.text: Hvar fæ ég gler öryggi (17amp) í gamlan land rover?
Fæst í N1 annars myndi ég prófa Framtak blossa, þeir eru með lucas umboðið og eiga eitt og annað á lager

Þegar það fer öryggi í Land Rover þá er best að setja nýtt rafkerfi í hann. <<<icon_biggrin.gif>>>

Back in the '70s Lucas decided to diversify its product line and began manufacturing vacuum cleaners. It was the only product they offered which didn't suck.

Recommended procedure before taking on a repair of Lucas equipment: check the position of the stars, kill a chicken and walk three times clockwise around your car chanting: "Oh mighty Prince of Darkness protect your unworthy servant."

Lucas systems actually uses AC current; it just has a random frequency.

<<<icon_lol.gif>>>
